articles.title: "Clear Message To Kremlin": UK Preps Big Troop Deployment In Europe - NDTV
articles.description: Britain is poised to offer NATO a "major" deployment of troops, weapons, warships and jets in Europe, Prime Minister Boris Johnson announced Saturday, to respond to rising "Russian hostility" towards Ukraine.
articles.content:
"This package would send a clear message to the Kremlin," Boris Johnson said.

articles.title: INTERVIEW | Steinhoff looks to offload shares in bid to cut R170 billion debt burden | Fin24 - News24
articles.description: To decrease its debt burden of €9.83 billion (~R170 billion), retailer Steinhoff is considering selling more shares in its pan-European subsidiary the Pepco Group, which listed on the Warsaw stock exchange in May.
